These approach base two different theory necessary promote successful implementation . DOC.brief_title: Sustaining Improving Clinicians ' Use Evidence-Based Psychotherapy ( EBP ) PTSD
DOC.detailed_description: This project compare two different method post-training support promote sustain improved CPT delivery : Fidelity-oriented learning community ( FID-LC ) Continuous Quality Improvement Learning Community ( CQI-LC ) . Clinics clinicians previously receive CPT train randomly assign one condition . Outcomes observe change patient symptom follow treatment , independent expert assessment clinician fidelity adaptation deliver psychotherapy ( via audio-recordings ) , proportion eligible caseloads receive CPT , capacity deliver CPT . Data also collect assess clinician set characteristic may contribute success strategy . The study result help inform best support ongoing implementation benefit evidence-based psychotherapy ( e.g. , CPT ) routine clinical setting . This knowledge translation project partnership 3 system ; VA Canada , U.S. Veterans Health Care System National Centre PTSD .
